title: FUNCINPEC
summary: The National United Front for an Independent, Neutral, Peaceful and Cooperative Cambodia,[lower-alpha 1] commonly referred to as FUNCINPEC,[lower-alpha 2] is a royalist political party in Cambodia. Founded in 1981 by Norodom Sihanouk, it began as a resistance movement against the People's Republic of Kampuchea (PRK) government. In 1982, it formed a resistance pact with the Coalition Government of Democratic Kampuchea (CGDK), together with the Khmer People's National Liberation Front (KPNLF) and the Khmer Rouge. It became a political party in 1992.
